title: E-Learning Instructional Design Strategies for Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and fundamental practical experience
context.additional_context: An asynchronous online course operated in a BYOD environment, emphasizing strengthening pre-service/in-service teachers' competency in designing nursing simulation education

learning_goals: Learners can explain core components of nursing simulation-based e-learning modules (scenarios, assessment rubrics, interactive elements)
Learners can apply simulation design principles that enhance learner engagement (feedback systems, difficulty adjustment, situational decision-making structures)
Learners can propose three or more formative assessment strategies for large learner groups in LMS environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
